properties.description:
Adversaries may look for details about the network configuration and settings of systems they access or through information discovery of remote systems
Source URL: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_hktl_sharpview.yml
Author: frack113
Date Modified: 2023-02-14
Status: experimental
References: https://github.com/tevora-threat/SharpView/, https://github.com/PowerShellMafia/PowerSploit/blob/dev/Recon/PowerView.ps1, https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1049/T1049.md#atomic-test-4---system-discovery-using-sharpview
False Positives: Unknown
properties.query:
_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (TargetProcessFilename =~ "SharpView.exe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\SharpView.exe" or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Add-RemoteConnection" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Convert-ADName" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ConvertFrom-SID" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ConvertFrom-UACValue" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Convert-SidToName" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Export-PowerViewCSV" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Find-DomainObjectPropertyOutlier" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Find-DomainProcess" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Find-DomainShare" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Find-DomainUserEvent" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Find-DomainUserLocation" or
